ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A non-parametric method for identifying potential outlying observations in a collection of phylogenetic trees based on the methods of Owen and Provan (2011). Such discordant trees may indicate problems with sequence annotation or tree reconstruction, or they may represent interesting biological phenomena, such as horizontal gene transfers.

A non-parametric method for identifying potential outlying observations in a collection of phylogenetic trees based on the methods of Owen and Provan (2011). Such discordant trees may indicate problems with sequence annotation or tree reconstruction, or they may represent interesting biological phenomena, such as horizontal gene transfers.

name: r-kdetrees
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.5' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-kdetrees
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url: {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/kdetrees/kdetrees_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: af65c382b3e52a2bfe7ed8b9a3ff05f2cdd0a1a122c972ed2f79d02dae178ede

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ape
    - r-distory
    - r-ggplot2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ape
    - r-distory
    - r-ggplot2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('kdetrees')"           # [not win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/grady/kdetrees
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: A non-parametric method for identifying potential outlying observations in a collection
    of phylogenetic trees based on the methods of Owen and Provan (2011). Such discordant
    trees may indicate problems with sequence annotation or tree reconstruction, or
    they may represent interesting biological phenomena, such as horizontal gene transfers.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - eead-csic-compbio  

# Package: kdetrees
# Type: Package
# Title: Nonparametric method for identifying discordant phylogenetic trees
# Version: 0.1.5
# Date: 2014-05-21
# Author: Grady Weyenberg and Ruriko Yoshida
# Maintainer: Grady Weyenberg <grady.weyenberg@uky.edu>
# Description: A non-parametric method for identifying potential outlying observations in a collection of phylogenetic trees based on the methods of Owen and Provan (2011). Such discordant trees may indicate problems with sequence annotation or tree reconstruction, or they may represent interesting biological phenomena, such as horizontal gene transfers.
# License: GPL-2
# Depends: R (>= 2.15.1)
# Imports: ape, distory, ggplot2
# URL: http://github.com/grady/kdetrees
# LazyData: TRUE
# Packaged: 2014-05-21 20:18:16 UTC; grady
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-05-30 01:09:11
